bibl.title: An Oxyrhynchus Fragment on Harmonic Theory.
bibl.note: P. Oxy. LIII, 3706, fr. I, col. i: An interpretation of the argument that this passage seems to have contained, and some inferences about the character of the work from which it came.
bibl.seg: BARKER Andrew, An Oxyrhynchus Fragment on Harmonic Theory.
P. Oxy. LIII, 3706, fr. I, col. i: An interpretation of the argument that this passage seems to have contained, and some inferences about the character of the work from which it came.
